message.content: OK, so Fabio's session should be pulled from the daemon that is running on the background of the machine. And then I'll send to you the location. You first take a read and see how we can get his sessions using the Ultracontext API the same way that daemon gets. /Users/fabioroma/Code/ultracontext/ultracontext
OK, so what's the best way to get Fabio's sessions from the UltraContext API and make it work on the demo and dump them on the folder?
Can you make this to run after each call of the MCP tool query? Then every session is always fresh with the latest contexts?
how to use it on chathpt then?
